GSD.description:
scsi: lpfc: Fix call trace observed during I/O with CMF enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit ae373d66c427812754db5292eb1481b181daf9ce. For more details please see the references link.
